page.title: 06Entertainment in Camberley
page.content:
The{cinema}is on the outskirts of Camberley. Inside it has been divided into one large and two smaller cinemas. It is also used as a bingo hall.
We have a{Civic Hall,}which is used for discos, plays and art exhibitions. It has a large car park next to it.
Night life in Camberley does not amount to much, but there are two {disco type clubs,}one of which my mother remembers dancing in when she was a girl.
Most of the young people go a few miles away to Fleet, Frimley Green or Bagshot where there are{Country Clubs.
We also have an{arcade}of video games.
